decision_conditions: An additional condition shall be added to planning permission reference 585/APP/2015/848 dated 21-12-2015 to state:

'The approved development shall be built in accordance with the approved plans, except that the Land East of Mons Block (LEOMB) parcel (as defined on plan ref. LEO-BDP-ZZ-RL-DR-A-PL-1001 Rev P03) may be developed either in accordance with the approved plans, or in accordance with planning consent ref. 585/APP/2017/2819 and 585/APP/2022/665 and, in the latter circumstance, any remaining development approved pursuant to this Planning Permission may still be developed, providing it is developed strictly in accordance with the approved plans.
To comply with the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (As Amended).'

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, other than Conditions 5, 6, 14 and 54 which must be discharged/adhered to as amended by application references 585/APP/2016/3572 and 585/APP/2016/4052, all other conditions relating to planning permission reference 585/APP/2015/848 dated 21-12-2015, must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
description: Application for a Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref. 585/APP/2015/848 dated 21/12/15 (Variation of condition 5 of planning permission ref: 585/APP/2009/2752 dated 18/01/2012 (redevelopment of former RAF Uxbridge site) to amend approved plans and drainage strategy regarding the Town Centre Extension phase of the development) for the addition of a severance condition.
